ALERT: Tele-Town Hall Event with Elon Musk ğŸš¨
Join Elon Musk for a live Tele-Townhall on November 4th at 8:30pm or November 5th at Noon to discuss the future of America. You'll receive a text before the event starts, so be sure to listen in! Save the date!
In addition to taking your questions, Elon will talk about the success of America PAC's petition in support of Free Speech and the Right to Bear Arms. It's your chance to earn money and support our Constitution-Please sign now: 1.am-pac.co/0RINWR
Stop to End
